hide-gm-rolls.settings.sanitize-rolls.hi: Hide the roll formula and results for public GM rolls from players, showing only the total.
hide-gm-rolls.settings.sanitize-dice-so-: Sanitize Dice So Nice! GM Rolls
Do not roll dice for players on public GM rolls.
hide-gm-rolls.settings.sanitize-crit-fai: Remove the crit and fumble colors from rolls.
hide-gm-rolls.settings.sanitize-better-r: Merge base and criticial damage on BR5e critical cards, so that crits are opaque.
hide-gm-rolls.settings.hide-private-roll: Hide private GM rolls from players entirely.
hide-gm-rolls.settings.hide-player-rolls: Hide blind/private rolls made by players from other players.
hide-gm-rolls.settings.hide-item-descrip: Hide description on item cards when posted by the GM, in case those cards contain sensitive information.
hide-gm-rolls.settings.private-hidden-to: When performing a roll as a GM for a hidden token, automatically roll privately.
